channel.title: CVE Feed for PLANEX COMMUNICATIONS INC. -- MZK-DP300N
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PLANEX COMMUNICATIONS INC. -- MZK-DP300N

item.title: CVE-2024-45372|2024-09-26T04:06:47.174Z -- planex%20communications%20inc. -- mzk-dp300n
item.description: MZK-DP300N firmware versions 1.04 and earlier contains a cross-site request forger vulnerability. Viewing a malicious page while logging in to the web management page of the affected product may lead the user to perform unintended operations such as changing the login password, etc.
